author: CNET
description:
CNET's Andrew Lanxon puts the iPhone 17 Pro through the ultimate filmmaking test as he makes a short movie. Working side by side with a BlackMagic Pyxis 6K camera, Andrew compares the two to answer the question, "Can an iPhone 17 Pro be another tool in a filmmaker's kit?"

You can find the products featured in ths video linked below
Apple iPhone 17 Pro, US Version, 512GB https://zdcs.link/QVEWXN
Blackmagic Design Pyxis 6K Full-Frame Cinema Box Camera https://zdcs.link/zEJpgG
SmallRig Universal Quick Release Phone Cage Kit https://zdcs.link/9YMZWx
Crucial X10 Pro 4TB Portable SSD https://zdcs.link/zJrGgk
SmallRig 52mm Magnetic Variable ND Filter Kit https://zdcs.link/QPV68m
DZOFilm Arles 35mm T1.4 FF/VV Prime Cine Lens  https://zdcs.link/911mj8
DZOFILM X-Tract 18-28mm T8 2.1x Macro Probe Lens https://zdcs.link/aeKEbX
Sigma 105mm f/2.8 EX DG OS HSM Macro Lens https://zdcs.link/aXVmWp
